translations: v．重新计算：重新进行计算或估算，通常是因为数据或条件发生变化。
· The system recalculates the total cost after applying the discount.
系统在应用折扣后重新计算总成本。

sentences.sentence: Controls how the spreadsheet model recalculates.
sentences.translation: 控制电子表格模型如何重算。

sentences.sentence: When a change is made in one cell, the program recalculates the contents of all cells affected by the change.
sentences.translation: 当一格数字改变，程序重新计算所有格受到此次改变的内容。

sentences.sentence: When you Angle the camera up into a corner of the room, the computer recalculates and then you see into the corner of the set.
sentences.translation: 如果你把摄像头往上扳一个角度，让它对着房间一角，电脑就会重新计算新的位置参数。
